墥字的基本解释

墥
tuǎn
同“疃”。

墥
dǒng
〔??墥〕蚂蚁做窝时堆在穴口的小土堆。

墥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dǒng］
［《集韻》覩動切，上董，端。］
义未详。
[②]［tuǎn］
［《集韻》土緩切，上緩，透。］
同“疃1”。

墥字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　墥； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页238第37
【集韻】覩動切，音董。【說文】䵺墥，封垤也。　又吐孔切，音侗。義同。　又土緩切。同疃。禽獸所踐處。畽?䠪，?同。

墥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
墥字的起名意思

暂无。

Nan
Basic explanation of words
Nan
tuǎn
Same as "tuan."
Nan
dǒng
〔?? 墥〕 The small mound piled up at the mouth of the hole when the ants make their nest.
Nan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dǒng］
["Ji Yun", Dong Dong, Duan. ]
The meaning is unclear.
[②]［tuǎn］
["Ji Yun" The soil is cut slowly, the upper is soft, and the depth is clear. ]
Same as "疃1".
Nan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　墥; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 238 Page 37
【Ji Yun】Fun moving cut, sound Dong. 【Speaking text】Wason, Fengqianye.　 spit hole and cut again, sound dong. The same meaning.　Cut the soil slowly. Same as Tuan. Where the beasts trampled.畽? 䠪,? The same.
